summary: This document is an email chain between attorneys Bobbi C. Sternheim and others regarding the preparation of a joint submission letter to the court in the case of U.S. v. Maxwell. It discusses coordinating a draft filing concerning a defense request related to the MDC warden.

events.title: Drafting of Joint Court Submission
events.description: Attorneys correspond to review, revise, and file a joint submission letter per court order, concerning a defense request related to the MDC warden in U.S. v. Maxwell.

locations: West 19th Street office (Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim)
keyFacts: The communication is between legal professionals working on the U.S. v. Maxwell case.
They are preparing a joint submission to the court regarding a defense request related to the MDC warden.
The correspondence occurred on December 1, 2020, during the COVID-19 pandemic, with the law office operating remotely.
The attached file suggests the letter concerns conditions or requests involving the Metropolitan Detention Center warden.
